sections.heading: audits; criteria.The committee may develop criteria to be used to screen requests for performance audits
sections.text: The committee shall consult with the Legislative Auditor in the application of the screening criteria.SourceLaws 1992, LB 988, ยง 7;Laws 2003, LB 607, ยง 10;Laws 2006, LB 956, ยง 7.
